resources.string: Hi, I\'m Donald Trump, president of the United States of America. C\'mon ask me some questions. Together we can MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!

string-array.name: samples
string-array.item: "Hi, welcome to Crown! I’m Lucy, your virtual concierge. I’m here to answer all your questions and help you navigate your way around. Got a question about the restaurants, hotels or entertainment at Crown? No problem! Use the microphone button to ask me a question directly or tap the 'WHAT CAN I ASK' button."
"Crown is open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week except on the following days: Christmas Day, Good Friday and Anzac Day."
"Crown Casino Melbourne operates 24 hours a day, 7 days a week with the exception of Christmas Day, Good Friday and ANZAC Day. On these days Crown is closed rom 4am and re opens 12 noon."
"Crown Entertainment Complex is located on 8 Whiteman St, Southbank Melbourne. Crown Perth is located at Great Eastern Highway, Burswood Perth."
"Valet parking is available at the Casino Atrium Entrance - Whiteman Street. The cost is $55 per 24-hours period. Payment is on exit. All prices include GST. Parking rates are subject to change."

"At Crown we offer a diverse range of restaurants to cater to your every taste! Our restaurants range from premium for a complete dining experience to casual for a more relaxed atmosphere and a range of quick-bite restaurants for when you are on the go!"
"We have three five-star luxury hotels at Crown Melbourne. You can choose to stay at either Crown Towers, Crown Metropol or Crown Promenade."
"Every hour from 9:00pm to midnight on weekdays, and from 8:00pm to Midnight on weekends."

string-array.name: samples2
string-array.item: 丫米丫米,我最喜欢吃这个了,谢谢你.
想和我打拳击吗?让你见识一下我的厉害吧.
我生气的时候可是会踢人的哦,你可要小心点.
喜欢我的帽子吗?你可以在卡片收藏夹里购买哦.
